suggestions.title: Workday wrap-up
suggestions.message: You're in the final stretch of your workday, Jukka! Once you wrap up at 4:30, it might be a good time for a quick dog break and a breath of fresh air to clear your head before family time starts at 6.
suggestions.trigger_reason: User is finishing work in 15 minutes and the dogs are due for a break since their morning walk.

assessment: Jukka is concluding an early work shift while managing chronic pain and fatigue, with current wellness needs already addressed by active reminders.
